name: Cubanacan - Soneros Habano Maduro - Petite Sublime
additionalNotes: Soneros Maduro cigars is proof positive that Cubanacan Cigars ascribes to the theory, if you want to taste Cuban, have a Cuban blend it. Master Blender Omar Gonzalez-Aleman managed a factory in Cuba, and is now bringing the flavors, aromas and blends of the past to you through this oily, luscious maduro selection. Nicaraguan fillers and an Ecuadorian binder provide pepper and spice, while the wrapper offers natural maduro sweetness.
